definition: to complete a contract/to reach a deal
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
sale price/negotiated price/price reached in an auction

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍卖成交价成反比的原则确定。

sentences.english: Pure cotton grey fabric prices fell modestly, trading volume is still insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 纯棉坯布价格小幅下滑，成交量仍显不足。

sentences.english: After they had haggled for sometime, the two men decided to close the bargain.
sentences.chinese: 那两个人经过一番讨价还价以后，决定成交。

sentences.english: Yarn-dyed Plaid cotton market began to turn up, but almost no turnover.
sentences.chinese: 色织格子棉布市场开始露面，但成交量几乎没有。

sentences.english: Strong zoom in almost 1 time a day in trading volume, enclosed warehouses more than 2,200 employees.
sentences.chinese: 成交量较强一日放大近一倍，括仓两千二百余手。

sentences.english: Last year, Refco was the largest provider of customer transaction volume to the CME.
sentences.chinese: 去年，瑞富在芝加哥商品交易所的客户成交量最大。

sentences.english: The commision we get usually are 10% of the amount of each transaction.
sentences.chinese: 通常我们取得的佣金是每笔成交额的10%。

sentences.english: There are plenty of deals taking place far below the official average levels.
sentences.chinese: 有大量交易是以远低于官方平均水平的价格成交的。

sentences.english: For some artists, the winning bids set new records.
sentences.chinese: 对一些艺术家来说，成交价刷新了纪录。

sentences.english: Half nylon wire retrocession markets sold for very little, became a "free city" situation.
sentences.chinese: 锦纶半光复丝市场成交甚少，成了“有价无市”局面。

sentences.english: Increase your close-ratio by using this handy link.
sentences.chinese: 这个简便链接可以提高您的成交率。

sentences.english: Can change or cancel your unfilled orders anytime.
sentences.chinese: 可以随时更改或取消任何未成交的交易指令。

sentences.english: Difference of cationic silk market improved, sold steadily increasing.
sentences.chinese: 差别化的阳离子丝市场行情好转，成交价稳中有升。

sentences.english: This research is to study the influential factors of the housing sold prices.
sentences.chinese: 本研究系探讨影响中古屋成交价格的变动因素。

sentences.english: The deal was sewn up over drinks in the botel bar.
sentences.chinese: 这笔交易是在旅馆酒吧间喝酒时成交的。

sentences.english: Domestic wool fine yarn markets decline in trading volume, price trend is stable.
sentences.chinese: 国毛精纺纱市场成交量下降，而品种价格走势呈平稳。

definition: sale price/negotiated price/price reached in an auction
price competition/bid (in an auction)/to compete on price/to bid against sb
to auction/auction sale/to sell at a reduced price
